sentences.english: Content summary: granary is etiquette, food security is the national security strategy.
sentences.chinese: 倉廩實而知禮節，糧食安全就是國家戰略安全。

sentences.english: The topic of grain storage thus illustrates the economic sophistication of Qing officials.
sentences.chinese: 倉廩這一話題如此證明了清朝官員的經濟詭辯。

definition: to plan and consider/to reflect on one's best strategy
Zou Yan (305-240 BC), founder of the School of Yin-Yang of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
wind vane/anemometer/weathercock/fig. person who switches allegiance readily/turncoat
to dispatch troops/to send an army/to mobilize forces
self-sustaining/economically independent (of state aid, foreign subsidy etc)
after that, any remaining energy (idiom from Analects); time for extracurricular activities
to be in overall charge/to oversee
to grow old with unfailing eyes and ears (idiom)
Classic of Rites (same as 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4])
variant of 魯莽|鲁莽[lu3 mang3]
